name: default_xx_xx_64_xx
description: The operand size defaults to 64-bit in 64-bit mode

name: force_08_08_08_08
description: The operand size is forced to 8-bit

name: force_xx_xx_64_xx
description: The operand size is forced to 64-bit in 64-bit mode

name: force_32_32_32_xx
description: The operand size is forced to 32-bit, if no `REX.W` is present

name: force_32_32_64_64
description: The operand size is forced to 64-bit in 64-bit mode and forced to 32-bit in all other modes (used by e.g. `mov CR, GPR` and `mov GPR, CR`)
